name: Dangaronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 2 DAILY LIFE
name_original: Dangaronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 2 DAILY LIFE
description:
With one class trial under her belt, Yuna Kaigosha, Ultimate Child Caregiver, continues her fight against the dastardly Monokuma. Their new fighting ground is ... a carnival? Is this just harmless fun, or is there a dangerous enemy lurking in the shadows, ready to strike when her guard is down?

THIS FANGAME IS BASED ON SPIKE CHUNSOFT'S "DANGANRONPA" SERIES. ALL COPYRIGHTS BELONG TO SPIKE CHUNSOFT AND THIS GAME WILL NOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL PURPOSES

This game may contain some scenes that may be disturbing for some people, so player discretion is advised
